item.title: Accor Plus is the latest paid loyalty program offered by Accor
item.description:
Source: Accor. Accor Advantage Plus, the paid loyalty program from Accor with more than 350,000 members in 17 countries, has been renamed and enhanced. Now known as Accor Plus, this 21-year-old program allows members to enjoy enhanced experiences at over 600 Accor properties in the Asia Pacific region. The company stated that members can benefit from substantial discounts on accommodations, dining at over 800 restaurants, and access to various VIP events and partner offers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accor-plus-is-the-latest-paid-loyalty-program-offered-by-accor/

item.title: Singtel is dedicated to improving its services and is now providing Better Thursdays
item.description:
Source: Singtel. The new logo at Singtel headquarters in Singapore. Singtel recently introduced a refreshed brand identity, the first update in 16 years, with the tagline “Let’s make everyday better”. This signifies a new chapter in Singtel’s evolution beyond traditional telecommunications, expanding into multimedia and ICT services. Chua Sock Koong, Singtel Group CEO, stated: “Singtel is a familiar name for many generations in Singapore. We are seen as a dependable and trusted brand at the forefront of technology...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-is-dedicated-to-improving-its-services-and-is-now-providing-better-thursdays/

item.title: Dropmysite has undergone a rebranding and is now known as Dropsuite
item.description:
Dropmysite, a cloud-based backup provider for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), has been renamed Dropsuite. This rebranding reflects a new global vision, business strategy, and ambition focused on business continuity, data recovery, and protection. Dropsuite now offers a comprehensive suite of backup, recovery, and archiving solutions, consolidating its previous standalone brands: Dropmysite (website and database backup), Dropmyemail (email backup), and Dropmymobile (mobile data backup). Furthermore, Dropsuite has introduced DSE Server Backup, a new file-based server backup solution...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dropmysite-has-undergone-a-rebranding-and-is-now-known-as-dropsuite/
